title: Suggestion to League of Legends
body: I think having a feature of something like a wish list in the store would be pretty nice. If someone wants to gift you something they cn just look a tyour wishlist and see what things you want. Maybe have a maximum if 5 things on it and have the 1st thing show up when you hover over a summoner on the friends list on the side. If this could be added that would be great and would also serve as a place to quickly buy something you want instead of having to go into the store to buy it. Ty Rito Fam.

replies.body: Who even gifts in this salty wasteland

This ain't too bad actually, except this may hinder Riot's business since if there's greater risk for 'buying something wrong' they're more likely going to get more RP to get what they really want, something like how Riot's mystery gifting system works; lures you in with a ton of awesome skins first then it gets worse over time, with only some people really really lucky who get all awesome skins to 'boast' on the system to bring more customers in.

But overall it's an awesome idea, but not likely something Riot would put in anytime soon since it does hinder business to even a minor extent.
